inclusion.criterion: Chronic HCV infection, as defined by positive HCV antibody with confirmation of positive HCV RNA PCR at least 6 months apart
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Infection with any genotype (including mixed genotypes) is permitted
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Active injection drug use, defined as the parenteral use of any substance for non-medicinal purposes in the previous 60 days
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has chronic HCV infection and is on treatment. No evidence of co-infection with hepatitis B or active injection drug use.
